title: Requires contracts awarded by the state or a public authority for telephone customer service, to provide such service in the Spanish language
summary: Requires contracts, with a value of $1,000,000 or more, awarded by the state or a public authority for telephone customer service, to provide such service in the Spanish language in addition to English.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3299

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. BRENNAN -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the public authorities law, in
         relation to requiring the provision of telephone customer  service  in
         the Spanish language

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The state finance law is amended by adding  a  new  section
    2  139-1 to read as follows:
    3    S  139-1.  TELEPHONE  CUSTOMER  SERVICE CONTRACTS. NOTWITHSTANDING ANY
    4  PROVISION OF LAW TO THE CONTRARY, ALL CONTRACTS, WITH  A  VALUE  OF  ONE
    5  MILLION  DOLLARS  OR  MORE,  MADE AND AWARDED BY THE STATE OR ANY ENTITY
    6  THEREOF, ANY PUBLIC BENEFIT CORPORATION, OR ANY PUBLIC AUTHORITY PROVID-
    7  ING FOR THE PROVISION OF CUSTOMER SERVICE ON BEHALF OF  THE  STATE,  ANY
    8  ENTITY  THEREOF,  A  PUBLIC BENEFIT CORPORATION OR A PUBLIC AUTHORITY BY
    9  MEANS OF TELEPHONE BY A CONTRACTOR OR SUBCONTRACTOR, WHEN  SUCH  SERVICE
   10  IS  TO  BE PROVIDED IN THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE, SHALL REQUIRE THAT CUSTOMER
   11  SERVICE ALSO BE PROVIDED IN THE SPANISH LANGUAGE.
   12    S 2. The public authorities law is amended by  adding  a  new  section
   13  2881 to read as follows:
   14    S  2881.  TELEPHONE  CUSTOMER  SERVICE  CONTRACTS. NOTWITHSTANDING ANY
   15  PROVISION OF LAW TO THE CONTRARY, ALL CONTRACTS, WITH  A  VALUE  OF  ONE
   16  MILLION  DOLLARS  OR  MORE,  MADE  AND  AWARDED  BY ANY PUBLIC AUTHORITY
   17  CREATED BY THE STATE OR ANY  POLITICAL  SUBDIVISION  PROVIDING  FOR  THE
   18  PROVISION  OF  CUSTOMER  SERVICE  ON  BEHALF OF SUCH PUBLIC AUTHORITY BY
   19  MEANS OF TELEPHONE BY A CONTRACTOR OR SUBCONTRACTOR, WHEN  SUCH  SERVICE
   20  IS  TO  BE PROVIDED IN THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE, SHALL REQUIRE THAT CUSTOMER
   21  SERVICE ALSO BE PROVIDED IN THE SPANISH LANGUAGE.
   22    S 3. This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day  after  it  shall
   23  have  become a law and shall apply to all contracts awarded or in effect
   24  on or after such effective date.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06046-01-1
